original_text: And they departed from before Pihahiroth, and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness, and went three days'journey in the wilderness of Etham, and pitched in Marah.
korean_text: 하히롯 앞을 떠나 광야를 바라보고 바다 가운데를 지나 에담 광야로 사흘 길을 가서 마라에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: And they departed from before Pihahiroth
and passed through the midst of the sea
and went three days' journey in the wilderness of Etham
